name: QualiaTouch
description: QualiaTouch is about giving the machine perception and action capabilities with the outside world.
author: Qualia Touch

modules.name: DMX OUT 1
modules.description: Send DMX data to one channel

modules.name: DMX OUT 2
modules.description: Send DMX data to two consecutive channels

modules.name: DMX OUT 4
modules.description: Send DMX data to 4 consecutive channels

modules.name: Phone Sensor
modules.description: Receives smartphone sensor data from PhyPhox app to command CV signals.
modules.keywords: phyphox smartphone sensor tilt gyroscope accelerometer

modules.name: Depth Cam Sensor
modules.description: Receive data from Kinect sensor to command CV signals with your hand. Not affiliated with Kinect nor Microsoft.
modules.keywords: kinect sensor depth cam hand theremin leap
